title: Manufacturing Expo 2022
description: ASEAN’s Leading Machinery and Technology Event for Manufacturing and Supporting Industries “Manufacturing Expo 2022” will invite manufacturers from across ASEAN to discover endless possibilities to support the growth of manufacturing industry. The brighter and sustainable future will be achievable by the latest manufacturing machinery and technologies for mould and die, plastics, automotive parts, industrial automation technologies, as well as surface treatment and coating. Complemented by special showcases, education programs, and networking functions. If you are a technology provider, do not miss the opportunity to promote your brand and reach out to over 45,000 industrialists. Reserve space today and get a maximum benefits from our media channels for an entire year!
